Luzbel/Attilla:

Luzbel cursed and shout "Alert sistem, lock down section 24".  A 
slidder door closed all exits.

Both males walked towards RazorClaws, they were ready to attack.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Razor Claw sped in between the two dragons when thier breath turned 
to
> flames. He kicked his speed up so he apeared to be a blurr shooting 
past the
> two brothers. The dragons flame missed him and headed for one 
another.
